description: This table contains information about the account guarantor - patient relationship.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the account. This ID number could by encrypted if you have elected to implement enterprise reportingï¿½s encryption security function.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line number to uniquely identify the patient within the guarantor account.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the patient related to the guarantor of the account.

columns.name: GUAR_REL_TO_PAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The relationship of the patient to the guarantor of the account (e.g. Mother, Brother, Legal Guardian, etc.)


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Aunt


Brother


Daughter


Father


Friend


Granddaughter


Grandfather


Grandmother


Grandson


Legal Guardian


Mother


Other


Step Father


Sister


Self


Step Mother


Son


Spouse


Uncle


Employer


Unverified Proxy


Transplant Recipient

columns.name: PATIENT_ADDR_LINKED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient address and the guarantor address are linked.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No
